titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the Honorable William Lenthal Esq; Speaker of the Honorable House of Commons, of the fight between His Excellency's the Lord Fairfax forces at Maidstone, and the Kentish forces, June 1. 1648. Printed by the command of William Lenthal Esq; Speaker of the Honorable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Honorable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
